page.title: 11Clubs,Abermorddu & District
page.content: {DANCING: }Three clubs use the centre at Abermorddu School. {Morris Dancing:}This was started in 1982 and the 30 member troupe, called the Chantelle Stars, is trained on Friday evenings by Mrs.Maud Jones. Members,who range from 5 to 30 years, compete in N.Wales,Cheshire & Merseyside. {Ballet & Tap:}This is taught by Mrs. Susan Jones to over 100 pupils on a number of evenings. Pupils are aged from 3 to 18,but only two are boys. Some pupils perform in local concerts and compete all over the country. {Sequence Dancing:}Classes are held on Wednesday evenings, when from twenty to fifty adults enjoy a pleasant social evening under the guidance of two instructors who teach a variety of sequence dances.
